original_text: We define a new multispecies model of Calogero type in D dimensions with harmonic, two-body and three-body interactions. Using the underlying conformal SU(1,1) algebra, we indicate how to find the complete set of the states in Bargmann–Fock space. There are towers of states, with equidistant energy spectra in each tower. We explicitely construct all polynomial eigenstates, namely the center-of-mass states and global dilatation modes, and find their corresponding eigenenergies. We also construct ladder operators for these global collective states. Analysing corresponding Fock space, we detect the universal critical point at which the model exhibits singular behavior. The above results are universal for all systems with underlying conformal SU(1,1) symmetry.We define a new multispecies model of Calogero type in D dimensions with harmonic, two-body and three-body interactions. Using the underlying conformal SU(1,1) algebra, we indicate how to find the complete set of the states in Bargmann–Fock space. There are towers of states, with equidistant energy spectra in each tower. We explicitely construct all polynomial eigenstates, namely the center-of-mass states and global dilatation modes, and find their corresponding eigenenergies. We also construct ladder operators for these global collective states. Analysing corresponding Fock space, we detect the universal critical point at which the model exhibits singular behavior. The above results are universal for all systems with underlying conformal SU(1,1) symmetry.
original_translation: Definimos un nuevo modelo multiespecies de tipo Calogero en D dimensiones con interacciones armónicas, de dos cuerpos y de tres cuerpos. Usando el álgebra conforme subyacente SU(1,1), indicamos cómo encontrar el conjunto completo de estados en el espacio de Bargmann-Fock. Hay torres de estados, con espectros de energía equidistantes en cada torre. Construimos explícitamente todos los estados propios polinomiales, es decir, los estados del centro de masa y los modos de dilatación global, y encontramos sus correspondientes energías propias. También construimos operadores de escalera para estos estados colectivos globales. Analizando el espacio de Fock correspondiente, detectamos el punto crítico universal en el que el modelo muestra un comportamiento singular. Los resultados anteriores son universales para todos los sistemas con simetría subyacente SU(1,1) conforme. Construimos explícitamente todos los estados propios polinomiales, es decir, los estados del centro de masa y los modos de dilatación global, y encontramos sus correspondientes energías propias. También construimos operadores de escalera para estos estados colectivos globales. Analizando el espacio de Fock correspondiente, detectamos el punto crítico universal en el que el modelo muestra un comportamiento singular. Los resultados anteriores son universales para todos los sistemas con simetría subyacente SU(1,1) conforme.

with harmonic, two-body and three-body interactions.
Using the underlying conformal SU(1,1) algebra, we indicate how to find the complete set of the states in Bargmann–Fock space.
There are towers of states, with equidistant energy spectra in each tower.

We also construct ladder operators for these global collective states.
Analysing corresponding Fock space, we detect the universal critical point at which the model exhibits singular behavior.

The above results are universal for all systems with underlying conformal SU(1,1) symmetry.We

Definimos un nuevo modelo multiespecies de tipo Calogero en D dimensiones con interacciones armónicas, de dos cuerpos y de tres cuerpos. Usando el álgebra conforme subyacente SU(1,1), indicamos cómo encontrar el conjunto completo de estados en el espacio de Bargmann-Fock. Hay torres de estados, con espectros de energía equidistantes en cada torre. Output: Construimos explícitamente todos los estados eigenpolinomiales, es decir, los estados de centro de masa y los modos de dilatación global, y
encontramos sus correspondientes eigenenergías
. También construimos operadores de escalera para estos estados colectivos globales. Analizando el espacio de Fock correspondiente, detectamos el punto crítico universal en el que el modelo muestra un comportamiento singular. Los resultados anteriores son universales para todos los sistemas con simetría subyacente SU(1,1) conforme. harmonic, two-body and three-body intera.translated_key: interacciones armónicas, de dos cuerpos y de tres cuerpos
original_annotated_sentences:
We define a new multispecies model of Calogero type in D dimensions with
harmonic, two-body and three-body interactions
.
Using the underlying conformal SU(1,1) algebra, we indicate how to find the complete set of the states in Bargmann–Fock space.
There are towers of states, with equidistant energy spectra in each tower.
We explicitely construct all polynomial eigenstates, namely the center-of-mass states and global dilatation modes, and find their corresponding eigenenergies.
We also construct ladder operators for these global collective states.
Analysing corresponding Fock space, we detect the universal critical point at which the model exhibits singular behavior.

The above results are universal for all systems with underlying conformal SU(1,1) symmetry.We define a new multispecies model of Calogero type in D dimensions with
harmonic, two-body and three-body interactions
.
Using the underlying conformal SU(1,1) algebra, we indicate how to find the complete set of the states in Bargmann–Fock space.
There are towers of states, with equidistant energy spectra in each tower.
We explicitely construct all polynomial eigenstates, namely the center-of-mass states and global dilatation modes, and find their corresponding eigenenergies.
We also construct ladder operators for these global collective states.
Analysing corresponding Fock space, we detect the universal critical point at which the model exhibits singular behavior.
The above results are universal for all systems with underlying conformal SU(1,1) symmetry.
